meanings.sent1: The gift was beribboned with colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beribboned dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked quite beribboned after playing with the spool of ribbons.
meanings.sent4: The garden was beribboned with blooming flowers in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The beribboned hair bow added a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.sent1: The beribboned present was too pretty to unwrap.
meanings.sent2: The room was beribboned for the festive occasion.
meanings.sent3: The tree looked beribboned as the wind tangled the ribbons around its branches.
meanings.sent4: Her beribboned hat fluttered in the breeze as she walked down the street.
meanings.sent5: The beribboned wedding cake was a masterpiece of culinary art.
